item.title: Hey, i need help on how to get a working muteing command to work
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

You don’t know your own source’s name? Sad.

if(command.startsWith("mute")) { try { String mutedName = command.substring(5); int mutedPlayer = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(mutedName); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[mutedPlayer]; m.silentTimer = 1; sendMessage(mutedName+" has been permanently muted"); m.sendMessage("A member of staff has permanently muted you"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to permanently mute"); } }

I just made this now, you might want to change m.silentTimer = 1; to:

m.muted = 1;

Read full topic
